autopilotIp.title: IP address of the drone's autopilot
autopilotIp.description: IP used to create a connection with the autopilot.

autopilotPort.title: Port of the drone's autopilot
autopilotPort.description: Port on which autopilot service is running.

numberOfDrones.title: Number of drones
numberOfDrones.description: Number of drones in the swarm

numberOfSubscribers.title: Number of subscribers
numberOfSubscribers.description: Number of subscribers of the swarm (entities able to listen/send OPC-UA messages from/to the swarm)

isADrone.title: Set the requested instance as a drone
isADrone.description: The option used to determine if the instance is a drone. This affects the context of the user script (e.g. if it should be linked to an autopilot or publish its GPS coordinates)

isASimulation.title: Set the flight as a simulation
isASimulation.description: The option used to determine if the flight is real or if it is a simulation. This affects the context of the flight (e.g. if the take off is manual or automatic).

multicastIp.title: IP of the multicast group
multicastIp.description: IP address used to communicate with the other drones.

flightScript.title: Script's URL of the flight
flightScript.description: URL of the script which will be executed for the flight. This URL must be publicly accesible so that all drones can fetch the script.
